borderWidth.description: A number or string magnitude for the bw Tachyons token to be applied to the column.

border.description: An array to define in which sides of the row a border should be applied to (top, right, bottom, left or all).

horizontalAlign.description: Controls horizontal alignment for the items inside the flex-layout.col.

marginLeft.description: A number or string magnitude for the ml Tachyons token to be applied to the column.

marginRight.description: A number or string magnitude for the mr Tachyons token to be applied to the column.

paddingLeft.description: A number or string magnitude for the pl Tachyons token to be applied to the column.

paddingRight.description: A number or string magnitude for the pr Tachyons token to be applied to the column.

preventVerticalStretch.description: Prevents the row from stretching vertically to fill its parent height with height: 100%, using height: 'auto' instead.

rowGap.description: A number or string magnitude for the pb Tachyons token to be applied to rows inside of the flex-layout.col.

verticalAlign.description: Controls vertical alignment for the items inside the flex-layout.col.

width.description: Sets the width of the column. Accepts either a percentage or 'grow'.
